name: Drifter Gear
description: Rugged gear, worn ragged by The Drifter.

languages.description: Zerlumpte und abgetragene Ausrüstung, die vom Drifter getragen wurde.
languages.name: Drifter: Ausrüstung

languages.description: Équipement robuste mais usé du Voyageur.
languages.name: Équipement du Voyageur

languages.description: 드리프터가 해질 때까지 입고 다닌 튼튼한 의복입니다.
languages.name: 드리프터 장비

languages.description: Equipamiento resistente, usado por el Viajero.
languages.name: Equipamiento del Viajero

languages.description: 坚固的装备，已被漂泊者穿得破破烂烂。
languages.name: 漂泊者装备

languages.description: 漂流者が着用するボロボロの装備。
languages.name: 漂流者の装備

languages.description: Equipamento desgastado e esfarrapado usado pelo Peregrino.
languages.name: Equipamento do Peregrino

languages.description: 強固型裝備，已被漂泊者穿到破爛。
languages.name: 漂泊者裝備

languages.description: อุปกรณ์ของดริฟเตอร์ที่ทนทานและดูมอมแมม
languages.name: อุปกรณ์ของดริฟเตอร์

languages.description: Gezgin tarafından giyilen yırtık pırtık, dayanıklı teçhizat.
languages.name: Gezgin Teçhizatı
